# List of Monuments of National Importance in Tiruchirapalli circle

This is a list of Monuments of National Importance (ASI) as officially recognized by and available through the website of the Archaeological Survey of India in the Indian state Tamil Nadu. 162 Monuments of National Importance have been recognized by the ASI in Trichy circle of Tamil Nadu.
List of monuments
|}
See also
* List of Monuments of National Importance in India for other Monuments of National Importance in India
* List of State Protected Monuments in Tamil Nadu
